snippet.textDisplay:
Nobody seems to be talking about the mathematics of the problem.
In order to flatten the curve, you need to identify at least half of the contagious people before the doubling time.
The virus spreads exponentially, which means it doubles in size after a certain period of time.
Many people are saying that the number of infections of coronavirus doubles every 6 days.
So if you have 100 infected people in the first day, it will be 200 people 6 days later, and then 400 people in the next 6 days and so on.
So on the first day you have to identify at least 50 people infected with the virus, before the doubling time of 6 days.
If you are able to stop these 50 people from infecting others, the remaining 50 people will infect other people doubling the size to 100 people after 6 days.
But 100 is the initial number of people you had before the identification.
In this way you can completely stop the growth of the virus.
If you can identify at least half of the contagious people before the doubling time, the total number of infected people will never surpass 100 people.

snippet.textDisplay:
One thing that some people neglect to mention is that while the numbers of patients will skyrocket, 80% will need no treatment. Of those 20% may require in home or hospital care to manage symptoms. The following things should be done:
[IMPORTANT] Set up a neighborhood crisis mitigation center that will organize the following tasks:

A. Make a list of those most of risk in your neighborhood, age 70+, cancer patients, diabetics. Contact them and set up delivery schedules so that they do not need to go out to get medicine, food, et cetera.
B. i. Find out which households fall into the low income bracket. This includes those that may need help with rent; set up requesting that landlords and homeowners association offer a reprieve on rent for long time residents during the crisis.

ii. Make sure the people's basic needs are met perhaps by borrowing money at a low interest loan to be distributed to the qualified recipients. Or set up a hedge-fund by hedging the neighborhood's potential IFRS losses under ECL against new forms of employment. Or simply do a neighborhood wealth tax so that the lowest income families do not go without, perhaps they could be set up like mutual bonds that could be bought out when most needed.
C. Call every house in the neighborhood to inquire as to the overall-well being or each household member. Arrange daily or even twice a day check-ins for people living alone. Talk about anything, everything. CELEBRITIES, more important than your money would be your time. Join in these check in calls. It will mean the world to so many people.
D. Ask the children (and adults) to make get well soon cards for people in hospital. But EVEN MORE IMPORTANTLY, have them make posters and videos telling our health care workers how good a job they are doing and how much we need their strength right now.

please forgive spelling, grammar errors and such but it is 1 am I have had a long lonely day

Recovered patients are left with 70% lung function. COVID-19 will run its course, take its toll and transform society. Agenda 21. Right on schedule. Right on time. Arriving soon in your neighbourhood.

snippet.textDisplay: Interesting video. But, I take exception to the thought that Drastic action is ok. Shutting down schools and cancelling events is one thing. But shutting down most business and telling us to stay inside and turning our society into what looks like Marshall Law is going way too far. Millions of lives and billions of dollars are being hurt or lost. People are panic buying and hurting others who really need the products they can no longer get. People are losing their jobs. Their business’ are going under because they are not allowed to open. They will lose their homes because they can’t pay the rent. And the government isn’t going to pay for any of this. They only bail out the banks, not real Americans. Drastic measures destroy lives. This virus in killing the infirm and very old who are already close to death. 80% of all the deaths happen in nursing homes. And while we don’t want this to happen either we shouldn’t let the fear of something that may happen override what will happen when we go too far.

Bubonic plague killed at least half of the people in Europe, but with Coronavirus most people will barely notice any illness, even if 100% are eventually exposed to Coronavirus (lily pads cover the whole pond).  Probably the exposure level is already at least 10 TIMES what we know about, because there is no testing of asymptomatic people in the U.S.  Even mildly ill people have barely been tested.

So many people refuse to listen. It is so convenient to deny it and look the other way. My sister did not want to miss the company of children, grand children, brothers, sisters and her parents in law, even when they were snorting and sneezing. Now my 62 year old brother in law lies in the hospital, in coma attached to a respiratory machine. The 90 year old mother in law has it too and has been brought to the hospital. Many of this loving family are likely to be infected too.
I have no way of proving this story, no matter how true it is. So anybody who want to conveniently discard it as fake news... go ahead. Socialize as much as you like, infect your family and perhaps kill somebody you love.

Furthermore, the total suppression strategy will work only if people stick to it, and this method would have to be implemented on and off at intervals; once the virus is under control it can creep back into the populous. Im no expert but the Imperial paper is an intersting read. As it is based on science, it will inevitability be altered and improved upon every time the data gets better. Holla'

snippet.textDisplay:
Really useful video. I'm startled by people who don't get this. However, the real smacker hits when you put this together with actual death rates.


In Italy, the over-all mortality rate has been 4%.( Italy's a good comparison because it's economy is about the same as the US and people were moving around like they have been here.) At that rate, if a rock-bottom 20% of the US population is infected, we could be looking at about 2,600,000 deaths and about 20 million hospitalizations. Since the infection rate is more likely to be about 60% (some scientists say 80% in the long run), that's about 7,500,000 deaths and about 70 million hospitalizations.

Mortality rates vary with age, of course, and go down to very low numbers under 50, but younger people are still often hospitalized by covid-19. Some 40% of the people hospitalized with covid-19 are between 20 and 50. So parents of kids, for example, are at high risk of running into real trouble. And if there's not enough ICUs and ventilators, they may start dying too.

It's those numbers really put a punch behind "flatten the curve."


Case fatality ratio in Italy:
21.6% people 90 years and older
18.8% - 80-89 years,
11.8% - 70-79 years,
3.2% - 60-69 years.
1% - 50-59 years
0.3% or less for all younger age ranges.

BY: Imam Nasser Mohammad Al-Yemeni
IN : 05 - 03 - 2020 AD

In the name of Allah the All Merciful, the Most Merciful, Allah’s prayer of forgiveness upon His prophets and His loyal-servants in every time and place, no fear for them from His chastisement nor they shall grieve..
Indeed, so often we advised the decision makers; especially leaders of the Muslims, and the disbelievers in general also those who turn away but they do not like the advisers. Anyway, the deniers have disbelieved in Allah’s narration whether the atheists or the polytheists or the Muslims except upon whom my Lord has mercy from among them and he earned good in his faith, surely I left you to Allah the One, the Supreme, Who made me Khalifa of His over the worlds to make me prevail against you by His way and His power. Confirming with the word of Allah the Most High: {So leave Me alone with him who rejects this announcement. We shall lead them on (to destruction), from where they do not know.(44) And I fill them (with false hopes), surely My plan is firm.(45)}Truthful Allah the Great [Al-Qalam] 68:44-45
{فَذَرْنِي وَمَن يُكَذِّبُ بِهَٰذَا الْحَدِيثِ ۖ سَنَسْتَدْرِجُهُم مِّنْ حَيْثُ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ﴿٤٤﴾ وَأُمْلِي لَهُمْ ۚ إِنَّ كَيْدِي مَتِينٌ﴿٤٥﴾} صدق الله العظيم [القلم].

Verily, here He is challenging you with the smallest of His soldiers can not be seen by the naked eye, then He shook the world the great and the small a major shake while it is a mere human virus that you do not encompass knowledge about it where from Allah invaded you by it with which Allah is challenging the entire human medical scientists. Surely by no means and they can never find an antidote vaccine for it as they claim, no matter what they announced, do not let them seduce you! By Allah, they are indeed liars [although it is a tiny living creature from Allah’s hidden soldiers] even if the entire human physicians met for it; even if they were aiders and supporter to each other they can not and could never be able, by Allah’s permission, in order for you to know that you do not encompass a thing of His knowledge except in what He pleases, glory be to Him. but you are atheist people and you will indeed see what you did not expect from the scheme of Allah’s unknown soldier (Corona-virus) the suffocator. And Allah leads them on (to destruction) by means of His intelligent hidden way to get to whom Allah pleases of their elite from where they do not know, and see international health organization do not consider it an international disease yet! For the fact with their claim they will control it yet they indeed are liars. How can they control Allah’s chastisement?!
But the Imam Mahdi Nasser Mohammad Al-Yemeni a khalifa of Allah over the worlds I issue fatwa to you with Truth that it is not a mere international disease in fact an international chastisement, and since it is a sort of the minor chastisement before the major chastisement then definitely (number) of death is few initially but now the infected ones are in millions and many of them they do not know that they are infected and this is a cunning from Allah so they infect other people they think themselves are secure from Allah’s chastisement the suffocating to the respiratory system so it would constrict on him breathing air little by little as if he elevates up in the sky until he suffocates because of the constriction of his respiratory system and its channel, so how will Allah not afflict the arrogant ones of whom Allah pleases from among them as admonishment to the worlds for they may return back to their True Lord by pleading and supplicating to remove His chastisement away from them promising Allah to follow His Book the grand Quran and asking Allah steadfastness Who comes between them and their hearts so they would beseech from Allah to make their hearts steadfast to fulfill what they promised Him to avoid them His chastisement then removes it away from them to follow His Book the grand Quran so they be of these who are guided aright.

And with what I want to seal this explanatory-statement of mine is the call from Allah in His decisive Book during an admonition of His chastisement by the chest disease. Confirming with the word of Allah the Most High: {O people, there has come to you indeed an admonition from your Lord and a healing for what is in the chests; and a guidance and a mercy for the believers.}Truthful Allah the Great [Younus] 10:57.. Surely this is a chastisement admonition, a wisdom for the dutiful ones.
{يَا أَيُّهَا النَّاسُ قَدْ جَاءَتْكُم مَّوْعِظَةٌ مِّن رَّبِّكُمْ وَشِفَاءٌ لِّمَا فِي الصُّدُورِ وَهُدًى وَرَحْمَةٌ لِّلْمُؤْمِنِينَ﴿٥٧﴾} صدق الله العظيم [يونس]

I know that this is a chastisement, pain and great horror to people for they may repent then worship Allah, Him Alone no partner for Him, and they repent from the major sins, oppression and indecencies what appears of it and what is hidden secretly and openly, and they would make a complete ablution to worship Allah the One, the Supreme, then they do not call on anyone with Allah, and know the sure knowledge that it is a hidden international chastisement as a cunning from Allah the One, the Supreme. And it is not a mere disease as you claim, far from, very far, indeed you shall know, so flee from Allah to Him, verily I’m a clear warner to you from Him, and do not shut down His houses (of worship to prevent) who flee to their Lord to perform the prayer to their Lord, Him Alone no partner for Him, and he who enters Allah’s Houses to worship His Lord he is secure from the virus of suffocation even if entered with him the infected ones who flee to Allah surely it would not afflict the righteous worshipers who believe (trust) and rely on their Lord, so (trust) relying on Allah if you indeed are believers.

Know that corona-virus is a new chastisement of a mighty power; the chests disease, little by little until cuts off breath of whom Allah pleases, and he who got healed from it let him know that it is not because the treatment of the physicians; rather because of his supplication prayer to Allah the most Merciful than all who have mercy, it should not be for them to find a cure-treatment for Allah’s chastisement to the fact it is not an affliction for purging what is in your chests; in fact (it is) a chastisement afflicts chests of whom Allah pleases of those who from among you turn away for they may return back, and some of you who death make him decease with chastisement of suffocation that is what they call it [corona-virus] and it is not but from the minor chastisement to many people for they may return back and plead to their Lord so he would remove from away them the chastisement’s evil and they follow the grand Quran the True Book from their Lord.

By no means and never be removed from those who perform prostration on what they call it Turab Al-Hussein! Indeed, Allah did not send down an authority with that neither in the Quran nor in the sunna of the True explanatory-statement from their Lord, in fact; they innovated it out of themselves, also by no means and would never be removed from those who call on who are in the graves to remove the evil! Surely, they do not hear their call and even if they heard they would not respond to them and on judgement day they will deny the association of them (with Allah) and they would disown them and be against them. So how often we warned you and advised you to not call on anyone with Allah but unfortunately most of them do not believe in Allah but they associate (with Him). As well we warn the oppressors in general their elites and whoever comes after them in countries of Muslims and the worlds from the minor chastisement of Allah and other signs of chastisement until the major chastisement overwhelm them who were tyrants in the land and oppressed their people unjustly so they increased mischief, indeed your Lord over them as a watchful tower.

Thus we warn them from chastisement of asteroid of Al-Rajifa shakes what beyond the Atlantic ocean till the west of it in the United States of America so it would stir-up dust of their land’s soil, then the soil of their land would fill the world’s space and a striking wave spreads over regions of this world in whole and you shall indeed know that we are truthful with the permission of Allah Lord of the worlds. And Planet Saqar (comes) after that if the asteroid of chastisement did not cause remembrance to you, verily keep your duty to Allah — O possessors of understanding-minds.

And came the promised major mischief in the land of the blessed Al-Aqsa mosque; the first of two Qeblas. Indeed that the sanctity of Al-Aqsa mosque with Allah is as the sanctity of the Sacred mosque (Al-Haram) — O you who sold the exalted house of Allah. Surely you would never find from Allah a loyal-friend nor protector from His chastisement and you will indeed lose the world’s life and the hereafter, that is the manifest loss, verily I am a trustworthy adviser to you, and death came to you while you unaware turn away. O our Allah, I have delivered the message.. O our Allah, bear witness. And peace be upon the messengers, and praise be to Allah Lord of the worlds

.Allah’s khalifa and His servant; Imam Mahdi Nasser Mohammad Al-Yemeni

snippet.textDisplay:
The theory sounds great till you label the axis. 5% of the cases needs ICU bed. Take Japan as example who has the most ICU beds per capita13/100,000, in the world. 80% of population needs to catch it for herd immunity. Total icu bed required,126Mx80%x5%=5M, People spend 14 days in average in ICU, thus total required icu bed day is 70M. Japan has 1270 ICU beds. 70M/1270=55000 days.

Thus even for country with the most bed, it will take 150yrs to “flatten the curve” so it is under the hospital capacity. This is assuming you have 100% control on the diseases’s speed of spread, which ofc isn’t possible. This method of slowly infecting people clearly doesn’t work(so far it is just a theory with no evidence)

In comparison you can loads of test/ screening, find and isolate the case like what China/Korea/Singapore/Japan did. In places that already has large number of sick people, lock the place down for 2 months so you can start isolating the sick from the healthy. Center of outbreak wuhan is a megacity with densely populated 11M people, now it has 0 new cases. What is your excuse?

Western media and politicians, Stop all that ideology bs and start working, the virus will infect indiscriminately, caucasian or asian, police state citizens or citizens from the “land of free”. If millions are to be culled without vaccines as legitimate sacrifice for the economy ‘s sake like the UK is doing, I consider that regime evil.

snippet.textDisplay:
That's a pretty graph. Explain the z axis: Timing. When is the appropriate time to quarantine? The theory of this is great and spot on, but in a vacuum. However, wouldn't shutting down too early be just as ineffective as shutting down too late? Should middle of nowhere town US shut down for 12 weeks waiting for Italy to spread through Europe, then coastal US?

Also, If there is an 8 week shutdown at day 0 and one slips out, then we start over. How many shutdowns make sense? How much can small businesses and their families take on waiting for nothing to happen. (I get how nothing is a good thing and could be attributed to the shutdown)

snippet.textDisplay: I live in Ireland and no one here is doing much to stop this. We're being told to stay home, but planeloads of Irish people are constantly flying back here from Spain and Italy and all that happens is they're given a leaflet at the airport asking them to 'reduce contact'. Just a couple of weeks ago thousands of Italians came over here and I'm sure we'll see the effects of that in the next few weeks. Even the Irish 'minister for health' think the right to travel to EU countries is more important than stopping this virus. Thankfully both Spain and Italy are in lockdown so this won't continue but I fear the damage has already been done. I'm going out as little as possible but I can't get food delivered so I have to go out occasionally and it terrifies me. Not for myself but if I passed this on to anyone else, especially my elderly mother, I'd never forgive myself.

I am not talking Italy type lockdown where they let the "low risk" teenagers go out and party every night or the California "we depend on people to listen and stay home" lockdown that leaves the gas stations open and the police unable to enforce the "lockdown".
Speaking of Italy, the virus has spread to their police force, we should soon be seeing a break down in law and order over there, then maybe just maybe US will take this seriously, however it will probably be way too late.
